name: Dragonette, Sedge
description: The Sedge Dragonette is a tiny dragon with unique colors that help it blend into swampy surroundings, showcasing agile movements and a deceptive appearance.
memorable: Known for its ability to blend into the swamp and unleash a cloud of nausea on foes, it combines stealth with a strategic approach to combat.
goals: To ambush prey and defend its territory in swampy environments.
relations: It might be encountered with other swamp creatures or serve under a more powerful dragon.
environment: Typically found in swampy or marshy regions, utilizing its camouflage to evade detection.
strengths: Resistance to poison and immunity to being poisoned, enhancing its survival in combat.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity and Charisma scores limit its effectiveness in evasive actions and social interactions.
attacks: Uses a Bite attack for piercing damage and Spines that embed into targets, causing disadvantage on attack rolls until removed.
most_powerful_ability: Reeking Breath releases a nauseating gas in a cone that can poison foes, potentially incapacitating them.
senses: It has a passive Perception score of 14, indicating a good ability to notice hidden enemies or traps.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to alert to potential threats in its vicinity.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Stealth checks in swampy terrain with Swamp Camouflage.
Transforms ground into mud with Boggy Presence, hindering enemy movement.
Prickly Defense allows it to retaliate against melee attackers.
Avg Constitution score enhances its resilience in battles.
Can swim quickly to escape danger.
test_queries: dragonette that can turn ground to mud
creature with spines using poison attacks
